content.en: Traffic prediction: Researchers are exploring ways to accurately predict traffic speed and flow using algorithms. These algorithms, such as Graph Neural Networks, Dynamic Graph Convolutional Networks, and Multi-channel Graph Convolution and Long Short-Term Memory, are being used to model spatial-temporal dependencies, forecast short-term traffic, and achieve network-level multi-step traffic prediction. By leveraging deep learning models and adaptive fusion techniques, these algorithms aim to improve the accuracy and explainability of traffic flow forecasting.
content.da: Trafikforudsigelse: Forskere undersøger måder at præcist forudsige trafik hastighed og flow ved hjælp af algoritmer. Disse algoritmer, såsom Graph Neural Networks, Dynamic Graph Convolutional Networks og Multi-channel Graph Convolution og Long Short-Term Memory, bruges til at modellere rum-tid afhængigheder, forudsige kortsigtet trafik og opnå netværksniveau multi-trins trafikforudsigelse. Ved at udnytte dybe læringsmodeller og adaptive fusionsteknikker sigter disse algoritmer mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden og forklarbarheden af trafikflussforudsigelser.
